paper_abstract: In this paper, based on interleaved technique, we present a new method of constructing zero correlation zone (ZCZ) sequence sets. For any perfect sequence of length m(2k + 1) with in > 2, k >= 0 and an arbitrary Hadamard matrix of order T > 2, the proposed construction can generate new optimal ZCZ sequence sets in which all the sequences are cyclically distinct.
paper_title: New Families of Optimal Zero Correlation Zone Sequences Based on Interleaved Technique and Perfect Sequences
